vehicles.description: Three-wheeled vehicle directly in front of the ego car, loaded with bulky items that appear to be sticking out and may pose a risk of falling onto the road.
vehicles.explanation: The three-wheeled vehicle's unstable load can potentially create road hazards if items fall off.

vehicles.description: White sedan on the left side of the ego car traveling in the same direction.
vehicles.explanation: The presence of the sedan affects the ego car's ability to change lanes to the left.

vehicles.description: Motorcyclists on the right side of the three-wheeled vehicle, traveling in the same direction.
vehicles.explanation: The motorcyclists are vulnerable road users and require the ego car to maintain a safe distance and be prepared for possible sudden movements.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the current traffic scenario, there are a few notable road users and vehicles that can impact the driving behavior of the self-driving car, also known as the ego car.

Directly ahead of the ego car, there is a three-wheeled vehicle with a load of bulky items that seem to be protruding outwards. The precarious nature of the load poses a potential risk to road safety, as there is a chance that items could fall onto the road and create hazards.

To the left side of the ego car, there's a white sedan that's moving in the same direction. The location of the sedan is pertinent because it limits the ego car's ability to switch lanes to the left without causing interference.

Additionally, on the right side of the three-wheeled vehicle, motorcyclists are noticed traveling in the same direction. These motorcyclists are categorized as vulnerable road users due to their reduced protection compared to enclosed vehicles. Consequently, the ego car has to keep a safe distance and stay vigilant for any unexpected moves from the motorcyclists.

There are no other objects, vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, or barriers reported in this scenario. All the described objects must be considered by the autonomous driving system to ensure a safe journey.

1.description and explanation: This object is a construction vehicle, likely used for either construction or maintenance tasks in this area. It has a yellow body, which is commonly used for visibility and safety. Being on the road, this vehicle directly influences driving conditions, prompting the ego car to potentially adjust its speed and lane choice to safely pass the slower-moving or stationary construction vehicle, while also being mindful of nearby construction activity that could affect traffic flow.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance from the three-wheeled vehicle and be prepared to brake or steer gently away if debris falls onto the roadway. Do not attempt to overtake the three-wheeled vehicle without ensuring that the lane to the left is clear and that it is safe to do so. Also, monitor the motorcyclists to avoid any potential collision if they change lanes or alter speed abruptly.
